name: Solar System Exploration Betas
description:
Mostly just a fun solar system explorer (Not accurate at ALL) press 1-8 to view different planets (1-6 for v1.0 or earlier).
press 0 to go back to main camera. arrow keys to rotate view, [W & S to go forward and backward] Q & E to rotate side to side. (in v1.1 or later)

ctrl + [Q] through [Y] adds different filters.
